DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate bimatoprost 0.01% (LUMIGAN® RC) in patients with elevated intraocular pressure (IOP) due to primary open angle glaucoma (POAG) or ocular hypertension (OHT) in a clinical setting.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of LUMIGAN® RC in the Clinical Setting
DOC.criteria: Elevated IOP due to either primary openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension Determined by the treating physician to require treatment with LUMIGAN® RC
